text:
MNETY | FRONT-END SENIOR DEVELOPER | Eastern Europe / Remote | Competitive Payment

Mnety is a Swiss Fintech company that serves major banks in Europe with a unique derivatives/financial products trading platform software.

- Angular 5 [required]

- REST-Service [required]

- HTML5 [required]

- CSS [optional]

- Build-Processes [optional]

- i18 [optional]

We are looking forward to receiving your application under hiring@mnety.com
